item.title: Mobile optimization and responsive design
item.description: Our clients Hook Management, Sebastian Liste and Cyan understood that everytime more users are surfing the internet from their smartphones and tablets. For this reason they asked us to optimized their sites for mobile devices, specially for Iphone...
item.content:encoded:
Our clients Hook Management, Sebastian Liste and Cyan understood that everytime more users are surfing the internet from their smartphones or tablets. For this reason they asked us to optimized their sites for mobile devices, specially for iPhone but also for Android and Blackberry.

To improve the user experience in this kind of devices: We reduced the content of their sites, avoided uncomfortable zooms, simplified the layout and we had on mind the tactile dimension of these devices.

This kind of optimization did not change their content publishing workflow, and did not imply a double site maintenance either because it’s only one website adapting to different devices.

item.title: Uclothing new collection
item.description: We have just updated the new collection from Uclothing, a fashion brand launched in L.A. and London. U is your everyday Unique style: Unisex, Utilitarian, Universal.
item.content:encoded: We have just updated the new collection from Uclothing, a fashion brand launched in L.A. and London. U is your everyday Unique style: Unisex, Utilitarian, Universal.

item.title: Piero Martinello published at Siteinspire
item.description: Our website for the photographer Piero Martinello featured by Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the london based studio Kulor.
item.content:encoded: Our website for the photographer Piero Martinello featured by Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the London based studio Kulor. Check it out here.

item.title: Starting to work on a project for interior designer Fernanda Gonzalez
item.description: We were commissioned by the interior designer Fernanda González based in Barcelona to develop her visual identity and her portfolio website. Fernanda has worked on very different types of projects, from small apartments to big houses and offices. To develop the general concept for her website, we wanted to understand and know better her work. [...]
item.content:encoded:
We were commissioned by the interior designer Fernanda González based in Barcelona to develop her visual identity and her portfolio website. Fernanda has worked on very different types of projects, from small apartments to big houses and offices.

To develop the general concept for her website, we wanted to understand and know better her work. As a first stage, we took the first shots of her more relevant projects. Here you can check some of the picture that will be included in her online portfolio.

item.title: Piero Martinello’s new work for Benetton
item.description: Is good to hear good news from our clients. Some months ago we worked for Piero Martinello, a young Italian supertalented photographer. We took care of his website portfolio and pdf portfolio. Piero, after working extensively for Colors Magazine and different Social campaigns, has just taken this pictures in Paris for the International Benetton Campaign: [...]
item.content:encoded:
Is good to hear good news from our clients. Some months ago we worked for Piero Martinello, a young Italian supertalented photographer. We took care of his website portfolio and pdf portfolio.

Piero, after working extensively for Colors Magazine and different Social campaigns, has just taken this pictures in Paris for the International Benetton Campaign: It’s My time. Good job Piero.

item.title: www.guillermobrotons.com published at SiteInspire
item.description: Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the london based studio Kulor, has published a project we did for the graphic designer Guillermo Brotons. View publication here.
item.content:encoded:
Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the london based studio Kulor, has published a project we did for the graphic designer Guillermo Brotons.

View publication here.

item.title: Flat-a-porter at the Expansión economy Spanish journal
item.description: A big part of our job is to guide our clients to make the right steps in the internet, helping them to make things better in the medium that we best know and love and where we can contribute with our know-how. That is why we are delighted to hear good news from the clients [...]
item.content:encoded:
A big part of our job is to guide our clients to make the right steps in the internet, helping them to make things better in the medium that we best know and love and where we can contribute with our know-how.

That is why we are delighted to hear good news from the clients we are working for. In this case is Flat-a-porter, a company based in Barcelona and London that has been created to make your life easier setting up your flat and even finding it for you. This business has been profiled in the Spanish newspaper Expansion because of their successful course and business model.

Here you can read the article in digital format.

For Flat-a-porter, we worked on their corporate website and visual identity.
